channel.title: Need help changing the home when you log on
channel.description: i have changed my home looked for all cords for home and changed * i thinks* but i cant find how to make u go 2 the new home which is X:2440 Y:3161 (observatory) and when a new player logs on it goes to the old home can anybody help please?

item.title: Need help changing the home when you log on
item.dc:creator: @santaguy santaguy
item.description:
@santaguy wrote:

stap one open player.java search for

		// initial x and y coordinates of the player

U shuld see sotming like this:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet teleportToX = 3093;//3093; teleportToY = 3491;//3491;

Change the (xcoord) 2 times
change the (ycoord) 2 times
Somting like this:

		teleportToX = 3093;//3093;
		teleportToY = 3491;//3491;

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing the home when you log on
